content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted multiple shell commands to activate the environment, but all returned an error message stating that the source command could not be found. I tried various commands including activating the environment with conda.sh and activating the environment with the activate command, but all returned the same error message. Additionally, I attempted to activate the environment with a different path, but still received the same error message.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": ". /root/miniconda3/bin/activate && conda activate && echo \'Environment activated.\'"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_shell returned: STDOUT:\nb''\nSTDERR:\nb'/bin/sh: 1: .: cannot open /root/miniconda3/bin/activate: No such file\\n'", type='action_result')]
"""
